title: News reports from France. [No. 72/79] = Chroniques de France
brief_description: Cinemagazine: 1. Folon - Jean-Michel Folon, black and white and watercolor artist famous for his covers on international magazines and his posters. 2. A day in a schoolteacher’s life - Jean-Michel Taillon, a French grade school teacher. 3. Stones - Stones, marvels among minerals, most of the time concealed in the bowels of the earth or beneath the roar of the waves. 4. Jacques Douai - Portrait of French songster Jacques Douai.
